Garbage can be put into special containers of different colors in your city. This helps sorting.
In 2011, Uruguayan artist Juan Muzzi released the world's first bicycle with a frame made entirely of recycled plastic.
Plastic is used to make clothes, furniture, building materials, carpets, even roads and much more!
There are many projects directly related to plastic recycling.
The benches you sit on outside can be made of plastic.
